segment.source: About DaRT 8.0
segment.target: About DaRT 8.0

segment.source: About DaRT 8.0
segment.target: About DaRT 8.0

segment.source: About DaRT 8.0
segment.target: About DaRT 8.0

segment.source: Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 8.0 helps you troubleshoot and repair Windows-based computers.
segment.target: Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 8.0 helps you troubleshoot and repair Windows-based computers.

segment.source: This includes those computers that cannot be started.
segment.target: This includes those computers that cannot be started.

segment.source: DaRT 8.0 is a powerful set of tools that extend the Windows Recovery Environment (WinRE).
segment.target: DaRT 8.0 is a powerful set of tools that extend the Windows Recovery Environment (WinRE).

segment.source: By using DaRT, you can analyze an issue to determine its cause, for example, by inspecting the computer’s event log or system registry.
segment.target: By using DaRT, you can analyze an issue to determine its cause, for example, by inspecting the computer’s event log or system registry.

segment.source: DaRT supports the recovery of basic hard disks that contain partitions, for example, primary partitions and logical drives, and supports the recovery of volumes.
segment.target: DaRT supports the recovery of basic hard disks that contain partitions, for example, primary partitions and logical drives, and supports the recovery of volumes.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: DaRT does not support the recovery of dynamic disks.
segment.target: DaRT does not support the recovery of dynamic disks.

segment.source: DaRT also provides tools to help you fix a problem as soon as you determine the cause.
segment.target: DaRT also provides tools to help you fix a problem as soon as you determine the cause.

segment.source: For example, you can use the tools in DaRT to disable a faulty device driver, remove hotfixes, restore deleted files, and scan the computer for malware even when you cannot or should not start the installed Windows operating system.
segment.target: For example, you can use the tools in DaRT to disable a faulty device driver, remove hotfixes, restore deleted files, and scan the computer for malware even when you cannot or should not start the installed Windows operating system.

segment.source: DaRT can help you quickly recover computers that are running either 32-bit or 64-bit versions of Windows 8, typically in less time than it would take to reimage the computer.
segment.target: DaRT can help you quickly recover computers that are running either 32-bit or 64-bit versions of Windows 8, typically in less time than it would take to reimage the computer.

segment.source: Functionality in DaRT lets you create a recovery image.
segment.target: Functionality in DaRT lets you create a recovery image.

segment.source: The recovery image starts Windows Recovery Environment (Windows RE), from which you can start the Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset window and access the DaRT tools.
segment.target: The recovery image starts Windows Recovery Environment (Windows RE), from which you can start the Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset window and access the DaRT tools.

segment.source: Use the DaRT Recovery Image Wizard to create the DaRT recovery image.
segment.target: Use the DaRT Recovery Image Wizard to create the DaRT recovery image.

segment.source: By default, the wizard creates an International Organization for Standardization (ISO) image file and a Windows Imaging Format (WIM) file and let you burn the image to a CD, DVD, or USB.
segment.target: By default, the wizard creates an International Organization for Standardization (ISO) image file and a Windows Imaging Format (WIM) file and let you burn the image to a CD, DVD, or USB.

segment.source: You can deploy the image locally at end user’s computers, or you can deploy it from a remote network partition or a recovery partition on the local hard drive.
segment.target: You can deploy the image locally at end user’s computers, or you can deploy it from a remote network partition or a recovery partition on the local hard drive.

segment.source: What’s new in DaRT 8.0
segment.target: What’s new in DaRT 8.0

segment.source: DaRT 8.0 can help you quickly recover computers that are running either 32-bit or 64-bit versions of Windows 8, typically in less time than it would take to reimage the computer.
segment.target: DaRT 8.0 can help you quickly recover computers that are running either 32-bit or 64-bit versions of Windows 8, typically in less time than it would take to reimage the computer.

segment.source: DaRT 8.0 has the following new features.
segment.target: DaRT 8.0 has the following new features.

segment.source: Create DaRT images by using Windows 8 or Windows Server 2012
segment.target: Create DaRT images by using Windows 8 or Windows Server 2012

segment.source: DaRT 8.0 enables you to create DaRT images using either Windows® 8 or Windows Server® 2012.
segment.target: DaRT 8.0 enables you to create DaRT images using either Windows® 8 or Windows Server® 2012.

segment.source: For versions of Windows earlier than Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012, customers should continue to use earlier versions of DaRT.
segment.target: For versions of Windows earlier than Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012, customers should continue to use earlier versions of DaRT.

segment.source: Generate both 32- and 64-bit images from one computer
segment.target: Generate both 32- and 64-bit images from one computer

segment.source: DaRT 8.0 enables you to generate both 32-bit and 64-bit images from a single computer that is running DaRT, regardless of whether the computer is a 32-bit or 64-bit computer.
segment.target: DaRT 8.0 enables you to generate both 32-bit and 64-bit images from a single computer that is running DaRT, regardless of whether the computer is a 32-bit or 64-bit computer.

segment.source: In DaRT 7, the image that was created had to be the same, bit-wise, as the computer that was running DaRT.
segment.target: In DaRT 7, the image that was created had to be the same, bit-wise, as the computer that was running DaRT.

segment.source: Create one image that supports computers that have either a BIOS or UEFI interface
segment.target: Create one image that supports computers that have either a BIOS or UEFI interface

segment.source: DaRT 8.0’s support for both the Unified Extensible Firmware Interface (UEFI) and BIOS interfaces enables you to create just one image that works with computers that have either interface.
segment.target: DaRT 8.0’s support for both the Unified Extensible Firmware Interface (UEFI) and BIOS interfaces enables you to create just one image that works with computers that have either interface.

segment.source: Use a GUID partition table (GPT) for partitioning
segment.target: Use a GUID partition table (GPT) for partitioning

segment.source: DaRT 8.0 tools now support Windows 8 GPT disks, which provide a more flexible mechanism for partitioning disks than the older master boot record (MBR) partitioning scheme.
segment.target: DaRT 8.0 tools now support Windows 8 GPT disks, which provide a more flexible mechanism for partitioning disks than the older master boot record (MBR) partitioning scheme.

segment.source: DaRT 8.0 tools continue to support MBR partitioning.
segment.target: DaRT 8.0 tools continue to support MBR partitioning.

segment.source: Install Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012 on the local hard disk
segment.target: Install Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012 on the local hard disk

segment.source: DaRT 8.0 tools can be used only when Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012 are installed on the local hard disk.
segment.target: DaRT 8.0 tools can be used only when Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012 are installed on the local hard disk.

segment.source: Currently, there is no support for Windows To Go.
segment.target: Currently, there is no support for Windows To Go.

segment.source: DaRT 8.0 release notes
segment.target: DaRT 8.0 release notes

segment.source: For more information, and for late-breaking news that did not make it into the documentation, see the Release Notes for DaRT 8.0.
segment.target: For more information, and for late-breaking news that did not make it into the documentation, see the Release Notes for DaRT 8.0.

segment.source: How to Get DaRT 8.0
segment.target: How to Get DaRT 8.0

segment.source: This technology is a part of the Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack (MDOP).
segment.target: This technology is a part of the Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack (MDOP).

segment.source: MDOP is part of Microsoft Software Assurance.
segment.target: MDOP is part of Microsoft Software Assurance.

segment.source: For more information about Microsoft Software Assurance and acquiring MDOP, see How Do I Get MDOP (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=322049).
segment.target: For more information about Microsoft Software Assurance and acquiring MDOP, see How Do I Get MDOP (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=322049).
